title: Singapore Financial Regulator Warns AI Companies Are Overvalued
contentSnippet: The Monetary Authority of Singapore has cautioned that soaring valuations and opaque financing could expose AI investors to steep corrections.

title: Galaxy Slashes Bitcoin Price Target for 2025 as BTC Enters 'Maturity Era'
contentSnippet: Bitcoin is entering its “maturity era” after dipping below $100,000 this week, prompting Galaxy to cut its end-of-year price target for BTC.

title: Galaxy trims bitcoin year-end target to $120,000 amid whale selling, AI competition and gold demand
contentSnippet: Galaxy Digital says bitcoin’s “maturity era” has slowed upside momentum as whales offload and ETFs absorb supply.

title: S&P Digital Markets 50 Index Will Gain Blockchain Verifiability Via Chainlink

title: Stellar (XLM) Breaks Key Resistance Amid Heavy Volume Surge

title: HBAR Eyes $0.18 as Volume Surge Signals Possible Breakout
contentSnippet: Hedera’s HBAR token climbed 1.31% to $0.1725 on Tuesday, with trading volume soaring as technical indicators point to a potential move above key resistance levels.

title: Ripple Teams With Mastercard, Gemini to Use RLUSD to Settle Credit Card Transactions

title: EU Arrests Nine in Connection with $689M Crypto Scam Network
contentSnippet: Authorities have so far seized only a small fraction of the funds lost to the scam network, which spanned multiple EU states.

title: Ripple’s RLUSD to Power Mastercard Credit Card Settlements on XRP Ledger

title: Chainlink, Apex Group Test Onchain Stablecoin Compliance With Bermuda Regulator

title: TON Drops to $1.93 as Altcoins Lag Behind Bitcoin in Risk-Off Crypto Market
contentSnippet: Despite signs of stabilization, with TON consolidating in a narrow range, momentum remains fragile, and a break below $1.87 could lead to further losses.

title: Why Bitcoin Traders Should 'Buy the Dip, in Stages'
contentSnippet: A Standard Chartered analyst has outlined a three-stage strategy to buy the Bitcoin dip as the U.S. shutdown weighs on crypto markets.

title: CMT Digital raises $136 million for fourth crypto VC fund, falling short of $150 million target
contentSnippet: The Chicago-based offshoot of CMT Group began raising capital for its fourth crypto fund in mid-2024, targeting $150 million.

title: Metaplanet borrows $100 million against its bitcoin holdings to buy the dip
contentSnippet: The company’s bitcoin mNAV ratio has recovered slightly after dipping below parity last month, but shares remain down more than 80%.

title: YouTube Says New Policy Doesn't Ban All Crypto Content, Despite Uproar From Creators
contentSnippet: Crypto gamers feared that YouTube’s new gambling policy would ban their favorite content creators, but the platform said that won't be the case.

title: BONK Climbs 2.8% as Price Consolidates Above $0.000012 Support
contentSnippet: BONK gains 2.84% to $0.00001215 as volume surges 134% above average, maintaining upward momentum within defined technical boundaries.

title: Crypto’s Anti-Surveillance Boom: Zcash, Monero and the Return of Anonymity
contentSnippet: Privacy coins are outperforming as traders turn away from ETFs and transparent ledgers, reviving crypto’s oldest idea: digital cash that can move freely, without surveillance.

title: Hong Kong Charges 16 in $205 Million JPEX Crypto Fraud Probe

title: Bitcoin Bulls' Last Stand? $95K, According to This Well-Followed Analyst

title: Chainlink and Dinari bringing S&P crypto stock index onchain

title: Coinbase CLO: Bank Groups Opposing Trust Charter Bid Engaging in 'Protectionism'

contentSnippet: Recently, more digital asset treasuries are using share buybacks to narrow NAV discounts and support share prices.

title: RedStone launches HyperStone oracle to power permissionless markets on Hyperliquid
contentSnippet: RedStone launches HyperStone, a custom oracle powering Hyperliquid’s HIP-3 framework for permissionless perpetual markets and decentralized data feeds.

title: Paradigm leads $6 million seed round for Harmonic, aiming to help Solana reach Nasdaq speed
contentSnippet: “Harmonic brings Solana closer to being the onchain Nasdaq,” Harmonic co-founder Jakob Povšič told The Block.

title: Ripple raises $500 million at $40 billion valuation in round led by Fortress, Citadel
contentSnippet: Ripple has raised $500 million at a $40 billion valuation, as it expands across stablecoins, prime brokerage, and payments.

title: Hut 8’s 13% selloff over lack of AI tenant ‘short-sighted,’ says Benchmark after record quarter
contentSnippet: The firm reiterated its $78 price target for the stock, citing rising profitability and long-term growth potential across energy, AI, and BTC.

title: Iggy Azalea joins new Solana-based ‘celebrity coin’ launchpad Thrust as creative director, plans to migrate MOTHER token
contentSnippet: Iggy Azalea is migrating her MOTHER memecoin to Thrust, a new Solana-based token launchpad attempting to eliminate pump-and-dumps.
